attributes.action: actually listen to the Advisory Council on the Misuse of Drugs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
after reading the many reports from the ACMD it is clear that they're advise is ignored by our government, why is there a council such as this in place if it is to be ignored. it seems as though the scientific views are not given enough power over the non-scientific opinions of our leaders.

This petition is to give the ACMD a veto on the classification of all drugs including alcohol and tobbaco.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
